title: AN OIL PUMP ASSEMBLY FOR A VEHICLE LUBRICATION SYSTEM
abstract: The invention provides an oil pump assembly for a vehicle lubrication system comprising a pumping device (301), the oil pump assembly presenting an outlet (302) leading from the pumping device (301), and an inlet (303) leading to the pumping device (301), the oil pump assembly further comprising a relief valve (5) presenting a valve chamber (501) arranged to communicate via an outlet relief passage (502) with the outlet (302), and to communicate via a relief deposit passage (503) with a relief deposit location (504), the relief valve (5) further comprising a plunger (505) located in the valve chamber (501), the plunger (505) being movable between a closed position, in which communication between the outlet relief passage (502) and the relief deposit passage (503) is prevented, and an open position, in which communication between the outlet relief passage (502) and the relief deposit passage (503) is provided, the oil pump assembly further comprising a control valve (4) for controlling the relief valve (5), and a control passage (401) adapted to provide a communication between the outlet (302) and the control valve (4) via the valve chamber (501).

motivations: There is a need for an improved oil pump assembly in vehicle lubrication systems to manage oil pressure effectively.
objectives: Design an oil pump assembly that incorporates a relief valve to manage excessive oil pressure.
Develop a control system for the relief valve to ensure optimal oil pressure regulation.
methods: Implement a relief valve with a plunger that can move between open and closed positions to control oil flow.
Utilize a control valve and a control passage to regulate the relief valve's operation based on oil pressure.
results: Provide an effective oil pump assembly that prevents excessive oil pressure in vehicle lubrication systems.
Enhance the overall performance and reliability of the vehicle lubrication system.
llama_json.research_subject: Oil pump assembly design for vehicle lubrication systems

motivations: There is a need for an improved oil pump assembly for vehicle lubrication systems that can effectively manage oil flow.
objectives: To design an oil pump assembly with a relief valve and control valve that can regulate oil flow between various components of the assembly.
methods: The oil pump assembly includes a pumping device with an outlet and an inlet, a relief valve with a valve chamber, and a control valve.

The relief valve includes a plunger that can move between a closed position, preventing communication between the outlet relief passage and the relief deposit passage, and an open position, allowing such communication.
The control valve is designed to control the relief valve, with a control passage providing communication between the outlet and the control valve via the valve chamber.
results: The proposed oil pump assembly can effectively manage oil flow in a vehicle lubrication system.
openai_json.research_subject: Design of an oil pump assembly for a vehicle lubrication system

motivations: Vehicle lubrication systems require precise control of oil pressure to ensure optimal engine performance and prevent damage from excessive pressure.
objectives: Design an oil pump assembly with an integrated relief valve system that can effectively regulate oil pressure in vehicle lubrication systems.
Develop a control mechanism that enables precise management of the relief valve operation through a dedicated control valve.
methods: Implement a relief valve with a movable plunger that can switch between closed and open positions to regulate oil flow.
Integrate a control valve system connected via control passages to manage the relief valve operation.
Design communication pathways between the pump outlet, valve chamber, and relief deposit location for effective pressure management.
results: The oil pump assembly provides controlled pressure relief capabilities for vehicle lubrication systems.
The system enables precise regulation of oil flow through the coordinated operation of relief and control valves.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Oil pump assembly with integrated relief and control valve system for vehicle lubrication
